title: The new Razer Viper V2 Pro could be the best wireless gaming mouse yet
content:
Razer’s steady flow of new hardware continues with the reveal of its newest — and possibly best ever — gaming mouse, the Viper V2 Pro. As with its predecessors, the Viper V2 Pro has been designed in partnership with esports professionals to be the mouse for competitive gaming. On the outside things look about the same, but

The post The new Razer Viper V2 Pro could be the best wireless gaming mouse yet appeared first on XDA.
description: Razer's latest mouse, the Viper V2 Pro, is here to take competitive gaming up another couple of notches, and it can be yours right now.
